item.title: 债券为美联储削减开支的言论欢呼雀跃；猕猴桃苍蝇
item.description:
Asian stocks briefly made one-week highs on Wednesday, bonds rallied and the dollar sank on new hints at U.S. interest rate cuts, while the New Zealand dollar jumped after its central bank said another hike may be necessary if inflation proves stubborn.翻译:亚洲股市周三短暂触及一周高点，债券上涨，美元因美国降息的新暗示而下跌，而新西兰央行表示，如果通胀顽固，可能有必要再次加息，新西兰元则上涨。

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) rose 0.5% in early trade before weakness in Hong Kong tech shares dragged it back to flat.翻译:MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股市指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS)早盘上涨 0.5%，随后香港科技股的疲软将其拖回持平。

Japan's Nikkei (.N225) fell 0.2%. The New Zealand dollar was last up 1.1% at a four-month high of $0.6207, having blown past resistance.翻译:日本日经指数(.N225)下跌 0.2%。纽元兑美元最后上涨 1.1%，触及四个月高点 0.6207 美元，突破阻力位。

The U.S. dollar, meanwhile, slid to fresh multi-month lows on the euro, yen, sterling, the Australian dollar, yuan and Swiss franc. Gold hit a seven-month high above $2,051 an ounce.翻译:与此同时，美元兑欧元、日元、英镑、澳元、人民币和瑞士法郎跌至数月新低。金价触及 2,051 美元/盎司上方的 7 个月高点。

Overnight Fed Governor Christopher Waller - an influential and previously hawkish voice at the U.S. central bank - told the American Enterprise Institute that rate cuts could begin in a matter of months, provided inflation keeps falling.翻译:隔夜，美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒（Christopher Waller） ——一位在美联储颇有影响力且此前持鹰派立场的人士——对美国企业研究所表示，如果通胀持续下降，降息可能会在几个月内开始。

Fed funds futures rallied on the remark to price more than hundred basis points of cuts in 2024 and 40% chance they begin as soon as March. Two-year Treasury yields fell sharply and along with the dollar fell further still in Asia.翻译:联邦基金期货价格因 2024 年降息超过 100 个基点且最早于 3 月份开始降息的可能性为 40% 的言论而上涨。两年期国债收益率大幅下跌，美元在亚洲进一步下跌。

"The market clearly moved on Governor Waller's opening up the possibility of cuts," said Tapas Strickland, head of market economics at National Australia Bank in Sydney. Waller's remark echoed earlier comments made by Fed Chair Jerome Powell.翻译:悉尼澳大利亚国民银行市场经济主管塔帕斯·斯特里克兰表示，“沃勒州长开放降息的可能性，市场明显发生了变化。”沃勒的言论呼应了美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔早些时候的言论。

The two-year yield hit its lowest since mid-July at 4.70% and the benchmark 10-year yield fell 4 bps to its lowest since September at 4.30%.翻译:两年期国债收益率触及 7 月中旬以来的最低点 4.70%，基准 10 年期国债收益率下跌 4 个基点，降至 9 月以来的最低点 4.30%。

The dollar was last down 0.5% at 146.68 yen , its lowest since Sept. 12 and a drop of nearly 2% in three days. It touched a 3-1/2 month low at $1.1017 per euro .翻译:美元兑日元最新下跌0.5%至146.68日元，为9月12日以来最低，三天内跌幅近2%。触及 3-1/2 个月低点每欧元 1.1017 美元。

Waller said that if the decline in inflation continues, "for several more months ... three months, four months, five months ... we could start lowering the policy rate just because inflation is lower."翻译:沃勒表示，如果通胀持续下降，“再持续几个月……三个月、四个月、五个月……我们可能会因为通胀较低而开始降低政策利率。”

"There is no reason to say we will keep it really high," he said.

CONDITIONALITY

Waller's remarks extended what has been a two-week rally in stocks and bonds around the world since a benign U.S. inflation report two weeks ago -- except in China where doubts about the economy have investors decidedly downbeat.翻译:沃勒的言论延续了自两周前美国通胀报告发布以来全球股市和债券已连续两周上涨的势头，但中国除外，对经济的疑虑令投资者明显感到悲观。

Global stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) are up almost 9% in November and are tracking toward their best month in three years. The Hang Seng (.HSI) is flat and hasn't posted a positive month since July.翻译:全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS) 11 月份上涨近 9%，并正在朝着三年来最好的月份水平迈进。恒生指数(.HSI)持平，自 7 月以来尚未出现月度上涨。

The latest negative news came from Meituan (3690.HK) which flagged slowing fourth-quarter growth for its mainstay food delivery business. Shares fell 8% to a 3-1/2 year low on Wednesday, despite the company promising a $1 billion buyback.翻译:最新负面消息来自美团点评（3690.HK） ，该公司的支柱外卖业务第四季度增长放缓。尽管该公司承诺回购 10 亿美元，但周三股价仍下跌 8% 至 3-1/2 年低点。

The Hang Seng fell 0.9% on Wednesday. Mainland blue chips (.CSI300) fell 0.4% and are heading for a fourth monthly decline in a row with a 1.9% fall in November.翻译:恒生指数周三下跌 0.9%。内地蓝筹股(.CSI300)下跌0.4%，并有望连续第四个月下跌，11月份下跌1.9%。

Some analysts are also wary that markets have run with parts of Fed officials' remarks -- flagging possible rate cuts -- even though the comments have been conditional on further declines in inflation and on financial conditions staying restrictive.翻译:一些分析师还对市场跟随美联储官员的部分言论（暗示可能降息）感到谨慎，尽管这些言论是以通胀进一步下降和金融状况保持限制性为条件的。

New Zealand sounded something of a warning note on Wednesday when the central bank slightly lifted its interest rate projections and warned hikes may not be over.翻译:周三，新西兰央行小幅上调利率预测，并警告加息可能尚未结束，这听起来有点像警告。

"Bets ought to be guided by conditionality that policy is appropriately tight, not indulged with abandon on over-confidence that Fed is done (premised on linear projections of dis-inflation)," said Mizuho economist Vishnu Varathan.翻译:瑞穗银行经济学家 Vishnu Varathan 表示：“押注应该以政策适度紧缩为条件，而不是因对美联储行动的过度自信而放纵（以反通胀的线性预测为前提）。”

Elsewhere Australian inflation eased by more than expected. In commodities Brent crude futures steadied to $81.75 a barrel but were set for a monthly drop, while Singapore iron ore futures are up 9.6% in November at $130.50 a tonne.翻译:其他地区澳大利亚通胀放缓幅度超出预期。大宗商品方面，布伦特原油期货稳定在每桶 81.75 美元，但预计每月下跌，而新加坡铁矿石期货 11 月份上涨 9.6%，至每吨 130.50 美元。

Editing by Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:西蒙·卡梅伦-摩尔 编辑

item.title: 朝鲜经济特区有望复兴俄罗斯新贸易
item.description:
Once a North Korean experiment in limited capitalism, the Rason Special Economic Zone appears to be the epicentre of the isolated country's growing cooperation with Russia, experts say, including possible shipments of arms for the war in Ukraine.翻译:专家表示，罗先经济特区曾经是朝鲜有限资本主义的实验，现在似乎成为这个孤立国家与俄罗斯日益加强合作的中心，其中包括可能为乌克兰战争运送武器。

With apartment blocks and booming markets flooded with imported goods, the Rason SEZ, established in the 1990s on the border with China and Russia, was a dream destination for many North Koreans before tighter sanctions hit and pandemic-era border closings choked off nearly all trade and tourism, two experts who study Rason said.翻译:20世纪90年代在中国和俄罗斯边境建立的罗先经济特区，公寓楼和蓬勃发展的市场充斥着进口商品，在更严厉的制裁打击和大流行时期的边境关闭导致几乎所有贸易中断之前，它是许多朝鲜人的梦想目的地两位研究罗先的专家说：

In recent months, there have been clear signs that the area is poised for a comeback, with ships docking there for the first time since 2018, and satellite imagery suggesting a spike in trade from both the port and a rail line to Russia.翻译:近几个月来，有明显迹象表明该地区即将卷土重来，船只自 2018 年以来首次在此停靠，卫星图像显示从该港口和一条通往俄罗斯的铁路线的贸易量激增。

Although China - with its vastly larger economy and deeper historic ties with North Korea - might seem the obvious driver of a recovery in Rason, experts say the country's deepening cooperation with Russia may make a more immediate impact.翻译:尽管中国——拥有庞大的经济规模和与朝鲜更深厚的历史关系——似乎是罗先市复苏的明显推动力，但专家表示，中国与俄罗斯深化合作可能会产生更直接的影响。

"Now that North Korea and Russia are becoming very close against the backdrop of the Ukraine war, Russia might send more tourists to North Korea, which can reinvigorate tourism (in Rason)," said Jeong Eunlee, a North Korea economy expert at South Korea’s government-run Korea Institute for National Unification.翻译:韩国经济研究中心朝鲜经济专家郑恩利表示，“现在，在乌克兰战争的背景下，朝鲜和俄罗斯关系变得非常密切，俄罗斯可能会向朝鲜派遣更多游客，这可以重振罗先市的旅游业”。政府运营的韩国国家统一研究所。

Russia can also sell coal, oil, and flour through Rason, Jeong said, and if more North Korean workers are allowed to cross the border, they can send Russian medicine and other goods home for relatives to sell.翻译:郑说，俄罗斯还可以通过罗先出售煤炭、石油和面粉，如果允许更多朝鲜工人越过边境，他们可以将俄罗斯药品和其他货物运回家供亲戚出售。

The Russian Federal Customs Service said it had "temporarily suspended the publication of foreign trade statistics".翻译:俄罗斯联邦海关总署表示，已“暂时停止公布对外贸易统计数据”。

China accounted for 97% of North Korea's overall trade in 2022, according to South Korea's Korea Trade Investment Promotion Agency (KOTRA).翻译:据韩国贸易投资振兴院(KOTRA)称，2022年中国占朝鲜贸易总额的97%。

But Russia resumed oil exports to North Korea in December 2022 and had exported 67,300 barrels of refined petroleum to North Korea by April, United Nations data shows, the first such shipments reported since 2020.翻译:但联合国数据显示，俄罗斯于 2022 年 12 月恢复了对朝鲜的石油出口，截至 4 月已向朝鲜出口了 67,300 桶精炼石油，这是自 2020 年以来首次报告此类出口。

Lee Chan-woo, a North Korea economy expert at Teikyo University in Tokyo, said Russian wood cut by North Korean loggers could be resold to China through Rason, a town of about 200,000 people.翻译:东京帝京大学朝鲜经济专家李赞宇表示，朝鲜伐木工人砍伐的俄罗斯木材可以通过罗先市转售到中国，罗先市是一个约有 20 万人口的城镇。

Cho Sung-chan of Hananuri, a South Korean nonprofit that has financed a food-processing factory in Rason, predicted Russian influence there would grow.翻译:韩国非营利组织 Hananuri 的 Cho Sung-chan 预测，俄罗斯在那里的影响力将会增强。Hananuri 为罗先市的一家食品加工厂提供了资金。

"Assuming North Korea and Russia's honeymoon period becomes a long one, North Korea could get Russian support on food, energy and infrastructure through Rason," Cho said.翻译:“假设朝鲜和俄罗斯的蜜月期变得很长，朝鲜可以通过罗先获得俄罗斯在食品、能源和基础设施方面的支持，”赵说。

The two countries discussed expanding trade and testing delivery of meat products next year, Russia's natural resources minister Alexander Kozlov said on his Telegram channel after meeting with North Korean officials in Pyongyang in November.

MILITARY LOGISTICS

Since August, Rason's port has seen visits from Russian ships linked to that country’s military logistics system, according to U.S. and South Korean officials and reports by Western researchers citing satellite imagery.翻译:据美国和韩国官员以及西方研究人员援引卫星图像的报道，自八月以来，与该国军事后勤系统相关的俄罗斯船只多次访问罗先港。

Those ships are suspected of military supplies from North Korea to Russia, the reports said. The Kremlin has denied such shipments.翻译:报道称，这些船只涉嫌从朝鲜向俄罗斯运送军事物资。克里姆林宫否认有此类货物。

From Rason's port, North Korea has sent Russia an estimated 2,000 containers suspected of carrying artillery shells, and possibly short-range missiles, South Korean military officials have told reporters.翻译:韩国军方官员告诉记者，朝鲜已从罗先港向俄罗斯发送了大约 2,000 个集装箱，疑似装有炮弹，可能还有短程导弹。

Since late 2022, activity has been spotted around Rason's Tumangang station, which has rail links to Russia, said Chung Songhak, a senior researcher at the Korea Institute for Security Strategy who analyses satellite imagery around Rason.翻译:韩国安全战略研究所分析罗先周边卫星图像的高级研究员 Chung Songhak 表示，自 2022 年底以来，罗先市土满江站周围就发现了活动，该站有通往俄罗斯的铁路。

More train carriages were spotted after the Russian defence minister visited Pyongyang in July, Chung said, citing satellite imagery, adding that possible new cargo depots popped up in May.翻译:郑先生援引卫星图像说，俄罗斯国防部长7月份访问平壤后发现了更多火车车厢，并补充说5月份可能会出现新的货运站。

When leader Kim Jong Un visited Russia in September, he discussed restarting a stalled joint logistics project in Rason, building a new road bridge connecting it with Russia and additional grain supplies, Kozlov said.

'GLOBAL HUB'

Since Kim’s grandfather Kim Il Sung designated Rason a special zone in 1991 after the Soviet Union’s collapse and as China opened further, North Korean officials have tried to attract investment there.翻译:1991年苏联解体后，金正恩的祖父金日成将罗先指定为特区，随着中国进一步开放，朝鲜官员一直试图在那里吸引投资。

Rason, the oldest and largest of North Korea's 29 economic development zones, has been central to the country's push to attract foreign investment.翻译:罗先是朝鲜 29 个经济开发区中历史最悠久、规模最大的一个，一直是该国吸引外国投资的核心。

It has one of North Korea's first and biggest markets, was the site of the country's first mobile network, and is the only place where North Korea legalised buying and selling homes in 2018, according to experts and North Korea’s government publications.翻译:据专家和朝鲜政府出版物称，这里是朝鲜最早也是最大的市场之一，是该国第一个移动网络的所在地，也是朝鲜 2018 年唯一一个合法买卖房屋的地方。

The other zones have had poor results because of shaky infrastructure and international sanctions, according to South Korea's National Institute for Unification Education.翻译:韩国国家统一教育研究所表示，由于基础设施不稳定和国际制裁，其他地区的成绩不佳。

Abraham Choi, a Korean American pastor who works on religion exchanges with North Korea, said that when he last visited Rason in 2015, he saw both Chinese and Russian tourists.翻译:从事与朝鲜宗教交流工作的韩裔美国牧师亚伯拉罕·崔(Abraham Choi)表示，他上次访问罗先是在2015年，当时他看到了中国和俄罗斯游客。

South Korean media reports said that the Rason border with China had reopened in January 2023 and that trucks were trickling in. Choi said there were no signs yet of large groups of foreign tourists visiting Rason.翻译:韩国媒体报道称，罗先与中国的边境已于 2023 年 1 月重新开放，卡车正在缓缓驶入。崔表示，目前还没有迹象表明有大批外国游客访问罗先。

Lee of Teikyo University said that whichever outside country helped reinvigorate the special economic zone, it offered a potential bright spot for North Koreans after years of pandemic restrictions.翻译:帝京大学的李表示，无论哪个外部国家帮助重振经济特区，它都为朝鲜人在多年的流行病限制之后提供了一个潜在的亮点。

"Rason took a harder hit than other places in North Korea because it used to be on the front lines of the opening," Lee said. "Now many businesses have collapsed there, but as soon as the border fully reopens, North Koreans might think that the paradise can come back."翻译:“罗先市比朝鲜其他地方受到的打击更严重，因为它曾经位于开放的前线，”李说。 “现在那里的许多企业都倒闭了，但一旦边境完全重新开放，朝鲜人可能会认为天堂可以回来。”

item.title: 中国支付宝以近 4 亿美元出售印度 Zomato 股份 - 条款清单
item.description:
Chinese payments group Alipay launched a $400 million accelerated bookbuild to sell its stake in Indian food delivery giant Zomato (ZOMT.NS), according the deal's term sheet on Wednesday.翻译:根据周三的交易条款清单，中国支付集团支付宝启动了一项 4 亿美元的加速簿记建档计划，以出售其在印度食品配送巨头 Zomato (ZOMT.NS)的股份。

The deal comes after Reuters reported on Tuesday that Alipay was planning to sell its 3.4% in Zomato through block deals on Indian stock exchanges.翻译:此前路透社周二报道称，支付宝计划通过印度证券交易所的大宗交易出售其所持 Zomato 3.4% 的股份。

item.title: 澳大利亚为外国干涉审判开绿灯
item.description:
Australia's attorney general has approved foreign interference charges against an Australian marketing executive who worked in China, seven months after the man was arrested by police on his return from Shanghai.翻译:澳大利亚总检察长批准对一名在中国工作的澳大利亚营销主管提出外国干涉指控，七个月前该男子从上海回国后被警方逮捕。

Alexander Csergo, 55, who appeared on video link in a Sydney court on Wednesday, has been in custody since his arrest by Australian Federal Police in April at his mother's beachside Bondi home.翻译:55 岁的亚历山大·塞尔戈 (Alexander Csergo) 周三出现在悉尼一家法院的视频连线中，自 4 月份在其母亲位于邦迪海滨的家中被澳大利亚联邦警察逮捕以来，他一直被拘留。

He was the first person charged with "reckless foreign interference", and the second person charged under a law that criminalises activity that helps a foreign power interfere with Australia's sovereignty or national interests. It carries a maximum 15-year prison sentence.翻译:他是第一个被指控“鲁莽外国干涉”的人，也是根据一项将帮助外国势力干涉澳大利亚主权或国家利益的活动定为刑事犯罪的法律受到指控的第二个人。最高可判处 15 年监禁。

Csergo has denied the allegations and has not yet entered a plea.翻译:塞尔戈否认了这些指控，并且尚未提出抗辩。

He is accused of accepting cash from suspected Chinese intelligence agents in exchange for writing reports on Australia, including its AUKUS nuclear submarine partnership with the United States and Britain, and lithium mining, while living in Shanghai.翻译:他被指控在上海居住期间收受可疑中国情报人员的现金，以换取撰写有关澳大利亚的报告，包括澳大利亚与美国和英国的 AUKUS 核潜艇合作伙伴关系以及锂矿开采。

Csergo's lawyers have argued the reports were based on publicly available information and the case against him was shallow. They raised concerns about the broad scope of the foreign interference law, introduced in 2018.翻译:塞尔戈的律师辩称，这些报告是基于公开信息，而且针对他的案件很肤浅。他们对 2018 年推出的外国干涉法的广泛范围表示担忧。

Prosecutor Conor McCraith told the Sydney court a police brief and charges had been served on Tuesday.翻译:检察官康纳·麦克雷思向悉尼法庭提交了一份警方简报，并已于周二提出指控。

"We needed the consent of the attorney general, which has been obtained," McCraith told the court. A committal hearing date was set for Jan. 24.翻译:麦克雷思在法庭上表示：“我们需要得到总检察长的同意，我们已经获得了总检察长的同意。”预审听证会日期定于 1 月 24 日。

Csergo had worked in China since 2002 in data marketing, and wrote the reports during the COVID-19 lockdown in Shanghai as a source of income when he was unable to leave China because of border restrictions, an earlier court hearing was told.翻译:早些时候的法庭听证会获悉，Csergo 自 2002 年以来一直在中国从事数据营销工作，并在上海 COVID-19 封锁期间撰写了这些报告，作为收入来源，当时他由于边境限制而无法离开中国。

The court heard that Csergo told police in Australia he became anxious about two suspected Chinese intelligence agents, known as "Ken" and "Evelyn", who made contact via the LinkedIn social media platform, and whom he later met in Shanghai cafes.翻译:法庭获悉，Csergo 告诉澳大利亚警方，他对两名涉嫌中国情报人员（“Ken”和“Evelyn”）感到焦虑，他们通过 LinkedIn 社交媒体平台联系，后来他在上海的咖啡馆遇见了他们。

The court was told he arrived back in Australia with a "shopping list" of intelligence priorities.翻译:法庭被告知，他带着一份情报优先事项的“购物清单”回到澳大利亚。

item.title: 中国对武汉代孕、假亲子鉴定展开调查
item.description:
Chinese authorities have suspended a hospital and a judicial institute in the city of Wuhan from conducting some services after they were accused of surrogacy and issuing fake paternity results.翻译:武汉市一家医院和一家司法机构被指控代孕并出具虚假亲子鉴定结果，中国当局已暂停其提供部分服务。

The suspension comes amid several investigations related to the issuance of fake birth certificates as China, where surrogacy is illegal, tries to boost its birth rate.翻译:此次暂停是在代孕非法的中国试图提高出生率之际，针对签发虚假出生证明进行了几项调查。

Wuhan Puren Hospital has been suspended from releasing birth certificates and Wuhan Ruiboxiang Judicial Appraisal Institute has been suspended from providing judicial appraisal services, the Wuhan Municipal Health Commission said on Tuesday.翻译:武汉市卫生健康委员会周二表示，武汉普仁医院已暂停发放出生证明，武汉瑞博祥司法鉴定所已暂停提供司法鉴定服务。

A task force has been set up to investigate the hospital and institute.翻译:已成立一个工作组对医院和研究所进行调查。

"We will seriously pursue accountability in accordance with laws and regulations based on the investigation," the commission said.翻译:证监会表示：“我们将根据调查结果，依法依规严肃追究责任。”

The hospital and institute were accused of "illegal activities" by an online influencer called Shangguanzhengyi, the official China Daily newspaper reported.翻译:据官方的《中国日报》报道，该医院和研究所被一位名叫上官正义的网络影响者指控为“非法活动”。

He alleged the institute could provide fake paternity test results and parents could provide fake results to reissue the birth certificate, allowing non-biological children to be given a bogus identification.翻译:他声称该机构可以提供虚假的亲子鉴定结果，父母也可以提供虚假的结果来重新签发出生证明，从而允许非亲生子女获得虚假的身份证明。

The service cost around 180,000 yuan ($25,187) in cash, the newspaper said.翻译:该报称，这项服务的现金费用约为 18 万元人民币（25,187 美元）。

The case comes a few weeks after the director of a hospital in China's central Hubei province was investigated for brazenly selling birth certificates, with the hospital's obstetrics and gynaecology department forced to suspend operations.翻译:几周前，中国中部湖北省一家医院的院长因公然出售出生证明而受到调查，该医院的妇产科被迫暂停营业。

Birth certificates are required in China for obtaining household registration and are necessary for vaccinations, medical insurance enrolment and application for a social security card.翻译:在中国，办理户口登记、接种疫苗、参加医疗保险和申请社会保障卡都需要出生证明。

Birth rates have fallen in China to their lowest since records began in 1949, at just 9.56 million in 2022.翻译:中国的出生率已降至 1949 年有记录以来的最低水平，2022 年仅为 956 万人。

($1 = 7.1463 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1463 人民币）

item.title: 负债累累的中国地方政府争相发行210亿美元专项债券救助小银行
item.description:
Local governments in China have sold record amounts of so-called special bonds this year to inject capital into struggling smaller banks, as authorities seek to contain spillover risks from a deepening property crisis and a sputtering economy.翻译:中国地方政府今年发行了创纪录数量的所谓特别债券，为陷入困境的小型银行注入资金，当局试图遏制不断加深的房地产危机和经济不景气带来的溢出风险。

Special-purpose bonds are a form of off-budget debt financing used by local governments in China, with the proceeds raised typically earmarked for specific policy goals, such as spending on infrastructure projects.翻译:特殊用途债券是中国地方政府使用的一种预算外债务融资形式，筹集的资金通常专门用于特定的政策目标，例如基础设施项目支出。

Local governments plan to use the proceeds of the latest bond sales to purchase equity or convertible bonds from smaller banks, most of them state-owned, effectively recapitalising them, according to the deal prospectuses.翻译:交易招股说明书显示，地方政府计划利用最新发债的收益，从规模较小的银行（其中大多数是国有银行）购买股权或可转换债券，从而有效地对这些银行进行资本重组。

The governments have raised 152.3 billion yuan ($21.05 billion) via such bonds so far in 2023 to replenish the capital of small and medium-sized banks, according to data from the official China Electronic Local Government Bond Market Access.翻译:根据中国电子地方政府债券市场准入的官方数据，2023年迄今为止，政府已通过此类债券筹集了1523亿元人民币（210.5亿美元）来补充中小型银行的资本。

But total funds raised so far are modest compared to the banks' needs, analysts say.翻译:但分析师表示，与银行的需求相比，迄今为止筹集的资金总额并不多。

China's small, regional banks would need to address a capital shortfall of an estimated 2.2 trillion yuan based on a scenario where up to 20% of regional lenders face capital inadequacy, according to an October report by S&P Global Ratings.翻译:标准普尔全球评级公司 10 月份的一份报告显示，如果高达 20% 的地区性银行面临资本不足的情况，中国小型地区性银行将需要解决估计 2.2 万亿元人民币的资本短缺问题。

Highlighting Beijing's push to avoid a financial crisis like the one in 2008, the value of special-purpose bonds issued this year is already more than double the 63 billion yuan issued in 2022, and is the highest on record since such instruments were introduced in 2020 to help smaller lenders impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.翻译:今年发行的特殊用途债券的价值已经是2022年发行的630亿元人民币的两倍多，并且是自2020年推出此类工具以来的最高记录，突显了北京为避免2008年那样的金融危机所做的努力帮助受 COVID-19 大流行影响的小型贷方。

The trend highlights how more and more of the country's smaller banks are being propped up with government support, amid a deepening crisis in the property market, which accounts for about a quarter of the economy.翻译:这一趋势突显出，在占经济约四分之一的房地产市场危机日益加深之际，越来越多的中国小型银行得到了政府的支持。

Authorities have been ramping up measures to support real estate, including relaxing home purchase restrictions and lowering borrowing costs, although these have failed to shore up a meaningful recovery.翻译:当局一直在加大支持房地产的措施，包括放宽购房限制和降低借贷成本，尽管这些措施未能支撑有意义的复苏。

The People's Bank of China (PBOC) and the National Financial Regulatory Administration (NFRA) did not respond to Reuters request for comment.

DEEPER IN DEBT

The intensified efforts to support smaller banks also come amid growing worries about the impact of ballooning local government debt on the economy.翻译:在加大力度支持小型银行之际，人们越来越担心地方政府债务不断膨胀对经济的影响。

Local government debt reached 92 trillion yuan ($12.6 trillion), or 76% of China's economic output in 2022, up from 62.2% in 2019, according to the latest data from the International Monetary Fund.翻译:根据国际货币基金组织的最新数据，到2022年，地方政府债务将达到92万亿元人民币（12.6万亿美元），占中国经济产出的76%，高于2019年的62.2%。

While policymakers are highly concerned over rising debt levels, Beijing has little option but to support smaller banks to contain spillover risks, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，尽管政策制定者高度关注债务水平上升，但北京别无选择，只能支持规模较小的银行遏制溢出风险。

"It is important to avoid any failures of even the smallest institutions, as a single failure could generate knock-on effects and spread financial contagion to other financial institutions," said Gavekal Dragonomics researcher Zhang Xiaoxi.翻译:龙洲经讯研究员张晓曦表示：“即使是最小的机构，也要避免出现任何倒闭，因为单一的倒闭可能会产生连锁反应，并将金融危机蔓延到其他金融机构。”

It was not immediately clear if the central authorities had given any guidance to the local governments on recapitalising smaller banks, and who were the buyers of these special-purpose bonds.翻译:目前尚不清楚中央是否已就小型银行资本重组向地方政府提供任何指导，以及这些特殊用途债券的买家是谁。

Some provinces are accelerating plans to reform and defuse risks at local, high-risk small and medium-sized banks and to replenish capital via multiple channels, central bank governor Pan Gongsheng said in Beijing earlier this month.

CONTAGION RISK

Local governments and banks are fundamental to China's economy, with Beijing tasking provincial and city officials with meeting ambitious growth targets.翻译:地方政府和银行对中国经济至关重要，北京向省市官员下达了实现雄心勃勃的增长目标的任务。

But after years of over-investment in infrastructure, plummeting returns from land sales, and soaring COVID costs, economists say debt-laden municipalities now represent a major risk to the world's second-largest economy.翻译:但经济学家表示，经过多年对基础设施的过度投资、土地销售回报大幅下降以及新冠疫情成本飙升，负债累累的城市现在对世界第二大经济体构成了重大风险。

The issuance of fresh debt by the local governments to recapitalise banks, coming at a time when their own liabilities are growing rapidly, could make the financial balancing act for municipalities even more precarious.翻译:地方政府在自身负债迅速增长之际发行新债以对银行进行资本重组，可能会使市政当局的财务平衡行为变得更加不稳定。

On top of $21 billion raised so far this year, the Henan provincial government last week announced a plan to issue 28.2 billion yuan worth of special purpose bonds to recapitalise 26 local banks, according to the government website.

WEAK LINKS

Smaller regional banks are the weak links in China's $61 trillion financial sector, due to their industrial, sectoral and geographical concentration, opaque governance, and lack of stringent regulatory oversight.翻译:由于行业、部门和地域集中、治理不透明以及缺乏严格的监管，小型区域性银行是中国 61 万亿美元金融部门的薄弱环节。

As of end-September, China's rural commercial banks reported a 3.18% non-performing loan ratio with city commercial banks at 1.91%, data from the NFRA showed, higher than the average of 1.61% in the banking sector.翻译:NFRA数据显示，截至9月底，中国农村商业银行不良贷款率为3.18%，城市商业银行不良贷款率为1.91%，高于银行业1.61%的平均水平。

Many analysts believe the real amount of soured loans is far higher.翻译:许多分析师认为，不良贷款的实际数量要高得多。

Smaller Chinese banks face greater challenges in raising funds to replenish their balance sheets compared with their large peers, because of their lower creditworthiness, limited operating scope and risk profiles.翻译:与大型银行相比，规模较小的中国银行在筹集资金补充资产负债表方面面临更大的挑战，因为它们的信用度较低，经营范围和风险状况有限。

Among the top issuers of the special bonds this year are debt-laden provincial governments in Liaoning, Yunnan and the government in Inner Mongolia region, which aim to use the proceeds to recapitalise local banks.翻译:今年特别债券的最大发行者是负债累累的辽宁省、云南省政府和内蒙古地区政府，它们的目的是利用所得资金对当地银行进行资本重组。

Regional banks operating primarily in weaker regions heavily exposed to indebted local government financing vehicles bear higher credit risks than their peers in wealthy regions, S&P analysts said in last month's research note.翻译:标准普尔分析师在上个月的研究报告中表示，主要在实力较弱地区运营、地方政府融资工具负债累累的地区性银行比富裕地区的同行承担更高的信贷风险。

"Local governments are a likely the first line of defense whenever regional banks become stressed," they said. "Nevertheless, we expect local-government support to strained lenders will be selective."翻译:他们表示：“每当地区性银行面临压力时，地方政府可能是第一道防线。” “尽管如此，我们预计地方政府对紧张的贷方的支持将是有选择性的。”

Reporting by Ziyi Tang and Ryan Woo; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Kim Coghill翻译:唐子仪和吴瑞安报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Kim Coghill

item.title: Shein 的 IPO 引发了有关其供应链中涉嫌强迫劳动的新问题
item.description:
As China-founded e-commerce behemoth Shein moves to list in New York, U.S. lawmakers are again calling on it to prove that forced labor is not used to make its $5 T-shirts and $10 sweaters.翻译:随着中国创立的电子商务巨头 Shein 在纽约上市，美国立法者再次呼吁该公司证明其 5 美元的 T 恤和 10 美元的毛衣的生产过程中没有使用强迫劳动。

Shein confidentially filed for an initial public offering on Monday and could launch sales of its shares some time in 2024. The Singapore-based company has not determined the size of the deal or the valuation at IPO. Bloomberg reported earlier this month that it targeted up to $90 billion in the float.翻译:Shein 周一秘密申请首次公开募股，并可能在 2024 年某个时候出售其股票。这家总部位于新加坡的公司尚未确定交易规模或 IPO 估值。彭博社本月早些时候报道称，其发行目标为 900 亿美元。

Founded in 2012, Shein has been eyeing a U.S. IPO for at least three years but has been deterred by headwinds that included tensions between Beijing and Washington.翻译:Shein 成立于 2012 年，至少三年来一直考虑在美国首次公开募股，但因北京和华盛顿之间的紧张局势等不利因素而止步。

The online fast-fashion retailer, which manufactures most of its merchandise in China, faces criticism that Uyghur forced labor is used to make its low-priced apparel and home goods.翻译:这家在线快时尚零售商的大部分商品在中国生产，该公司面临着使用维吾尔族强迫劳动来生产其低价服装和家居用品的批评。

Critics are concerned that Shein may use contract manufacturers in China's Xinjiang region, where advocates and governments have accused China of interning Uyghurs and other largely Muslim minority groups. Beijing denies any abuses.翻译:批评者担心，谢因可能会使用中国新疆地区的合同制造商，那里的倡导者和政府指责中国拘禁维吾尔人和其他以穆斯林为主的少数民族群体。北京否认有任何侵权行为。

Convincing regulators that its supply chain is clean will likely be a major regulatory hurdle as Shein works to convince the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission that its shares should be traded publicly.翻译:让监管机构相信其供应链是干净的可能会成为主要的监管障碍，因为 Shein 正在努力说服美国证券交易委员会其股票应该公开交易。

“If the fast-fashion giant Shein wants to go public in the U.S., they should have to prove to American consumers that their products are not sourced from forced labor,” Democratic Representative Jennifer Wexton said in a statement on Tuesday.翻译:“如果快时尚巨头 Shein 想要在美国上市，他们应该向美国消费者证明他们的产品并非来自强迫劳动，”民主党众议员詹妮弗·韦克斯顿 (Jennifer Wexton) 在周二的一份声明中表示。

Earlier this year, the congresswoman led a bipartisan call for the SEC to halt Shein’s IPO until it verifies that the company does not use forced labor within its supply chain.翻译:今年早些时候，这位女议员领导两党呼吁美国证券交易委员会停止 Shein 的首次公开募股，直到核实该公司在其供应链中不使用强迫劳工。

A separate group of Republican attorneys general from 16 U.S. states has also asked the SEC to audit the company, and Shein has been investigated by two separate Congressional committees over its sourcing and use of a trade loophole that allows most of its products to enter the U.S. duty-free.翻译:来自美国 16 个州的共和党总检察长组成的独立小组也要求美国证券交易委员会对该公司进行审计，Shein 已受到两个独立的国会委员会的调查，原因是该公司的采购和利用了允许其大部分产品进入美国的贸易漏洞。 免税。

Shein did not immediately respond to a request for comment, but the company has previously told Reuters it has “zero tolerance for forced labor” and has no contract manufacturers in Xinjiang.翻译:Shein 没有立即回应置评请求，但该公司此前曾告诉路透社，该公司“对强迫劳动持零容忍态度”，并且在新疆没有合同制造商。

A spokesperson for the SEC said the agency does not comment on any individual entity’s filings.翻译:美国证券交易委员会发言人表示，该机构不会对任何个别实体的备案文件发表评论。

Megan Penick, a public securities lawyer at Michelman & Robinson, said it is unlikely to see a "direct block" from the SEC, but the agency could make the process difficult for Shein by making "the disclosure requirements so detailed, and, perhaps extreme, that it makes it seem ... trying to go public cannot be achieved."翻译:米歇尔曼·罗宾逊律师事务所 (Michelman & Robinson) 的公共证券律师梅根·佩尼克 (Megan Penick) 表示，不太可能看到 SEC 的“直接阻止”，但该机构可能会通过“披露要求如此详细，甚至可能是极端”，从而使 Shein 的流程变得困难。 ，这看起来……试图上市是不可能实现的。”

"There may be issues with the forced labor allegations and the IP (intellectual property) issues that may make it hard for (Shein) to be able to answer the questions to the satisfaction of the SEC," Penick said.

LOBBYING CAPITOL HILL

Public disclosures show that Shein has spent $1.28 million on Capitol Hill lobbying this year as it prepares to go public.翻译:公开披露的信息显示，Shein 今年在准备上市时已花费 128 万美元用于国会山游说。

The company has also met privately with lawmakers, including some of its biggest critics, in an effort to shift its reputation in Washington, according to several Congressional aides.翻译:据几位国会助手称，该公司还与立法者私下会面，其中包括一些最大的批评者，以努力改变其在华盛顿的声誉。

One source familiar with the matter said that representatives for Shein emphasized the retailer’s efforts to diversify its supply chain from China to other countries, including India.翻译:一位知情人士表示，Shein 的代表强调了该零售商努力将其供应链从中国转向包括印度在内的其他国家。

Shein also touted its efforts to bring more China-made goods to the U.S. in bulk on traditional container ships, which requires paying tariffs on those items.翻译:Shein还宣传其努力通过传统集装箱船将更多中国制造的商品批量运往美国，这需要对这些商品缴纳关税。

“Shein is fundamentally a Chinese company and investors should approach Chinese offerings with extreme caution. Its attempt to go public should prompt a closer look at its business practices, especially its links to slave labor and its evasion of U.S. customs laws," Republican Sen. Marco Rubio told Reuters.翻译:“从根本上来说，Shein 是一家中国公司，投资者应极其谨慎地对待中国产品。它的上市尝试应该促使人们更仔细地审视其商业行为，特别是其与奴役劳工的联系以及其逃避美国海关法的行为，”共和党参议员马可·卢比奥告诉路透社。

"I will closely monitor Shein's disclosures in the lead-up to its IPO,” added Rubio, who in June criticized the retailer’s lobbying efforts in a letter distributed to other senators.翻译:卢比奥补充道：“我将在 Shein 首次公开募股前夕密切关注 Shein 的披露情况。”6 月份，卢比奥在发给其他参议员的一封信中批评了该零售商的游说努力。

Republican Representative Chris Smith, chairman of the Congressional-Executive Commission on China, has also criticized Shein's lobbying efforts.翻译:国会及行政当局中国委员会主席、共和党众议员克里斯·史密斯也批评了谢因的游说努力。

“Any investor in this company should be wary of the material risks involved in Shein’s business model ... particularly as Congress is demanding an end to forced labor and closure of import subsidies for Chinese companies,” Congressman Smith said.

INCREASED SCRUTINY

In its most recent social impact report, Shein highlighted its partnership with Oritain, a company also used by the U.S. government to test cotton for links to China’s Xinjiang region. Shein previously told Reuters that it tests samples from every third-party cotton mill the company works with, and that it conducted 2,111 tests between June 1, 2022 and July 11, 2023.翻译:Shein 在其最新的社会影响报告中强调了其与 Oritain 的合作关系，该公司也被美国政府用来测试棉花与中国新疆地区的联系。 Shein此前告诉路透社，它测试了与该公司合作的每一家第三方棉纺厂的样本，并在2022年6月1日至2023年7月11日期间进行了2,111次测试。

Critics, however, say that the testing does not adequately screen the millions of garments exported globally by Shein every year.翻译:然而批评者表示，测试并没有充分筛查 Shein 每年向全球出口的数百万件服装。

Public securities lawyer Penick said that the SEC's handling of Shein's IPO will be crucial for other e-commerce players including ByteDance's TikTok and PDD Group's Temu, which may consider going public in the U.S. in the future.翻译:公共证券律师佩尼克表示，SEC 对 Shein IPO 的处理对于包括字节跳动旗下 TikTok 和拼多多集团旗下 Temu 在内的其他电子商务公司至关重要，这些公司未来可能会考虑在美国上市。

Shein's IPO is "going to be raising issues (for the SEC) that may later be applied across the board to all China-based or China-related companies that are going public," Penick said.翻译:佩尼克表示，Shein 的首次公开募股“将（向美国证券交易委员会）提出问题，这些问题随后可能会全面适用于所有即将上市的中国或与中国相关的公司”。

item.title: 早盘竞价：金融状况再次放松
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.翻译:展望未来一天的亚洲市场。

Interest rate decisions and guidance from New Zealand and Thailand, and inflation figures from Australia will be the main events for Asian markets on Wednesday, as a curiously directionless week for risk assets reaches the midway point.翻译:新西兰和泰国的利率决定和指导，以及澳大利亚的通胀数据将成为周三亚洲市场的主要事件，因为风险资产奇怪地没有方向的一周已经到了中点。

While emerging market and Asian equities clocked up decent gains on Tuesday, Wall Street struggled to make much headway despite a seemingly constructive market and economic backdrop.翻译:尽管新兴市场和亚洲股市周二录得可观涨幅，但尽管市场和经济背景看似建设性，但华尔街仍难以取得太大进展。

The dollar, Treasury yields, and stock market volatility all fell, and U.S. consumer confidence was higher than expected. Fed Governor Christopher Waller - thought to be close to Fed Chair Jerome Powell's thinking on policy - also signaled that U.S. interest rates could be cut in the months ahead.翻译:美元、 国债收益率和股市波动均下跌，美国消费者信心高于预期。美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒——被认为与美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的政策想法接近——也暗示美国可能在未来几个月降息。

The dollar and two-year Treasury yield slid to fresh three-month lows, the 10-year yield hit a two-month low and the VIX volatility index fell back to recent lows last seen before the pandemic. Yet the S&P 500 and Nasdaq ended flat.翻译:美元和两年期国债收益率跌至三个月新低，10年期国债收益率触及两个月低点，VIX波动率指数回落至疫情爆发前的近期低点。然而标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数收盘持平。

Perhaps that broad loosening of financial conditions will give Asian markets a bigger boost on Wednesday, although the underperformance of Chinese stocks shows little sign of abating even as the central bank chief pledged to keep monetary policy "accommodative" to provide support to the economy."翻译:也许金融环境的广泛宽松将在周三给亚洲市场带来更大的提振，尽管中国股市表现不佳，尽管央行行长承诺保持“宽松”的货币政策以支持经济，但中国股市的表现并没有显示出任何缓解的迹象。

The first of the main policy events in the region on Wednesday will be the Reserve Bank of New Zealand's policy decision. It is widely expected to hold the cash rate at 5.50%, so investors' interest will lie more in the bank's guidance.翻译:周三该地区的第一个主要政策事件将是新西兰储备银行的政策决定。人们普遍预计现金利率将维持在5.50%，因此投资者的兴趣将更多地取决于银行的指导。

Traders expect up to 50 basis points of easing next year, with the first cut coming in July. That's about half of what the Fed is expected to do, so it's no wonder the New Zealand dollar is outperforming - it is up 6.5% in the past month.翻译:交易员预计明年将实施最多 50 个基点的宽松政策，首次降息将在 7 月份进行。这大约是美联储预期行动的一半，因此新西兰元表现优异也就不足为奇了——过去一个月上涨了 6.5%。

Thailand's central bank is also expected to keep rates on hold, at 2.50%, through the middle of 2025. Disappointing third quarter growth and the exchange rate's 7% appreciation over the last month will have eased any lingering pressure on policymakers to raise rates again.翻译:预计泰国央行也将维持利率不变，即 2.50%，直到 2025 年中期。令人失望的第三季度增长以及上个月汇率升值 7%，将缓解政策制定者再次加息的挥之不去的压力。

Finally, figures from Australia are expected to show that price pressures cooled in October, with the annual rate of weighted consumer inflation slowing to 5.20% from 5.60%.翻译:最后，澳大利亚的数据预计将显示 10 月份物价压力有所降温，加权消费者通胀年率从 5.60% 放缓至 5.20%。

Reserve Bank of Australia Governor Michele Bullock on Tuesday reaffirmed that monetary policy was restrictive and working to dampen demand, though inflation in the service sector was proving sticker than hoped.翻译:澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔·布洛克周二重申，货币政策是限制性的，旨在抑制需求，尽管事实证明服务业的通胀高于预期。

The RBA is expected to keep its cash rate on hold at 4.35% next week, although there is around a 10% chance of a quarter point hike, according to futures market pricing.翻译:预计澳洲联储下周将维持现金利率在 4.35% 不变，但根据期货市场定价，加息 25 个基点的可能性约为 10%。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Wednesday:翻译:以下是周三可能为市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- New Zealand interest rate decision翻译:- 新西兰利率决定

- Thailand interest rate decision翻译:- 泰国利率决定

- Australia inflation翻译:- 澳大利亚通货膨胀

item.title: 俄罗斯作为五核大国主席国将会议推迟至2024年——副部长
item.description:
Russia, current chair of the "Big Five" nuclear-armed states, will not convene any meetings this year but has presented the group with a schedule for 2024, Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov told reporters on Tuesday, according to Russian news agencies.翻译:据俄罗斯新闻机构报道，外交部副部长谢尔盖·里亚布科夫周二对记者表示，“五大”核国家现任主席国俄罗斯今年不会召开任何会议，但已向该组织提交了 2024 年的时间表。

Russia took over coordination of the group from the U.S. in August. The "Big Five" are the veto-wielding permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, and also include China, France and Britain.翻译:俄罗斯于八月从美国手中接管了该小组的协调工作。 “五巨头​​”是联合国安理会拥有否决权的常任理事国，其中还包括中国、法国和英国。

"We have outlined our proposals on the agenda and the rough schedule, and can apparently expect to receive feedback from other members of the Five," Ryabkov was quoted as saying.翻译:里亚布科夫表示：“我们已经概述了议程和粗略时间表的建议，显然可以期待收到五国其他成员的反馈。”

"But in any case, the coordinator's program will all take place next year.”翻译:“但无论如何，协调员的计划都将在明年进行。”

item.title: 随着在线折扣店 Temu 的蓬勃发展，中国拼多多的业绩超出预期
item.description:
Temu parent PDD Holdings (PDD.O) beat third-quarter revenue forecasts on Tuesday as heavy discounting boosted sales across its e-commerce platforms in China and overseas, sending its U.S.-listed shares almost 14% higher in premarket trading.翻译:Temu 母公司 PDD Holdings (PDD.O)周二第三季度收入超出预期，大幅折扣提振了其在中国和海外电子商务平台的销售，导致其在美国上市的股价在盘前交易中上涨近 14%。

PDD, home to Chinese online discount retailer Pinduoduo as well as cross-border platform Temu, has received a big boost from the growing popularity of its international e-commerce arm, which is known for selling $4 earphones and $15 hoodies.翻译:拼多多是中国在线折扣零售商拼多多和跨境平台特木的总部，其国际电子商务部门日益受欢迎，该部门以销售 4 美元的耳机和 15 美元的连帽衫而闻名。

Analysts expect Temu, launched in September last year, to generate more than $16 billion in revenue this year. Since launching in the U.S., Temu is now available in 48 countries, including across Europe and the Middle East, as well as South East Asia and Australia.翻译:分析师预计去年 9 月推出的 Temu 今年将产生超过 160 亿美元的收入。自在美国推出以来，Temu 现已在 48 个国家/地区销售，包括整个欧洲和中东、以及东南亚和澳大利亚。

"PDD's overseas initiative Temu was the major driver for revenue growth," said Xiaoyan Wang, analyst at 86Research, who added that domestic Chinese revenue also outstripped growth at rivals Alibaba (9988.HK) and JD.com (9618.HK) by a "large margin".翻译:86Research 分析师王晓燕表示：“拼多多的海外业务 Temu 是收入增长的主要推动力。”他补充说，中国国内收入的增长也超过了竞争对手阿里巴巴（9988.HK）和京东（9618.HK）的增幅。 “大利润”。

Temu and its rival Shein, which according to sources has confidentially filed to go public in the U.S., have both benefited this year from a cost of living crisis in many countries increasing demand for their low-cost, largely Chinese-made goods.翻译:Temu 及其竞争对手Shein（据消息人士透露，该公司已秘密申请在美国上市）今年都受益于许多国家的生活成本危机，增加了对其低成本、主要是中国制造的商品的需求。

PDD's revenue rose 94% year-on-year to 68.84 billion yuan ($9.62 billion) in the quarter to Sept. 30, compared with an average estimate according to LSEG data of 54.59 billion yuan. The year-earlier result was still impacted by strict COVID-19 curbs in China.翻译:截至 9 月 30 日的季度，拼多多的收入同比增长 94% 至 688.4 亿元人民币（合 96.2 亿美元），而 LSEG 数据的平均预期为 545.9 亿元人民币。去年同期的结果仍受到中国严格的 COVID-19 限制措施的影响。

Deep discounts ahead of the Singles Day shopping event in China helped lift demand for products on Pinduoduo, which was able to leverage its reputation for low prices to capture more value-conscious consumers in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国双十一购物活动之前的大幅折扣帮助提升了拼多多产品的需求，拼多多能够利用其低价声誉吸引世界第二大经济体中更多注重价值的消费者。

Executives said on a post-earnings call with analysts that 620 billion users took part in its subsidies program over the Singles Day festival period.翻译:高管们在财报后与分析师举行的电话会议上表示，双十一期间有 6200 亿用户参与了其补贴计划。

China's e-commerce giants have all this year taken aim at the value-driven sector that has always been Pinduoduo's strong suit.翻译:今年以来，中国电商巨头纷纷瞄准拼多多一直以来的强项价值驱动领域。

"This year is a year of recovery but also a year of heightened competition ... and we are not surprised to see industry peers are increasing investment to increase competition," said co-CEO Zhao Jiazhen.翻译:“今年是复苏的一年，也是竞争加剧的一年……看到行业同行加大投资以加剧竞争，我们并不感到惊讶，”联席首席执行官赵家珍表示。

While PDD's focus will continue to be value for consumers, he added, it is also focussing on high quality to increase trust in PDD's platforms so consumers feel comfortable buying a wider range of goods.翻译:他补充说，虽然拼多多的重点将继续是为消费者提供价值，但它也注重高品质，以增加对拼多多平台的信任，让消费者放心地购买更广泛的商品。

Though the retail market in China was initially expected to bounce back strongly when strict COVID-19 curbs were lifted, Chinese consumers have remained cautious as the country faces more headwinds, including a property market downturn and record youth unemployment.翻译:尽管最初预计在严格的 COVID-19 限制措施解除后，中国零售市场将强劲反弹，但由于中国面临更多阻力，包括房地产市场低迷和创纪录的青年失业率，中国消费者仍保持谨慎态度。

Chinese retail sales in September rose 5.5% following 4.6% growth in August.翻译:继 8 月份增长 4.6%之后，9 月份中国零售额增长 5.5%。

PDD's net income attributable to ordinary shareholders rose to 15.54 billion yuan in the third quarter, from 10.59 billion yuan a year earlier.翻译:第三季度拼多多归属于普通股股东的净利润从去年同期的105.9亿元增至155.4亿元。

($1 = 7.1532 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1532 人民币）

item.title: 中国美团第四季度外卖收入增长放缓
item.description:
China's Meituan (3690.HK) on Tuesday said it expects fourth-quarter revenue growth for its core food delivery business to slow versus the preceding quarter, as persistent consumer caution and warmer weather for the winter season hits orders.翻译:中国美团点评（3690.HK）周二表示，由于消费者持续谨慎以及冬季天气转暖影响订单，预计其核心食品配送业务第四季度收入增长将较上一季度放缓。

Deliveries will also likely decline versus the same period last year, Meituan Chief Financial Officer Chen Shaohui said, as demand in the fourth quarter last year was helped by customers still grappling with curbs on movement caused by China's COVID policy, placing larger orders over longer distances.翻译:美团点评首席财务官陈少辉表示，与去年同期相比，交付量也可能会下降，因为去年第四季度的需求得益于仍在努力应对中国新冠疫情政策造成的出行限制的客户，他们在更远的距离下了大量订单。

He said he expects a similar trend for its non-food delivery service Meituan Instashopping.翻译:他表示，他预计其非食品配送服务美团Instashopping也会出现类似的趋势。

"We are stepping up our marketing efforts to stimulate demand in the current consumption environment," he said, adding that this would include higher subsidies.翻译:他说：“我们正在加大营销力度，以刺激当前消费环境下的需求。”他补充说，这将包括提高补贴。

The comments come as demand in the world's second-largest economy remains lacklustre, with China's post-pandemic economic recovery losing steam in recent months. Meituan CEO Wang Xing previously flagged a tougher third quarter for the food delivery business due to macroeconomic headwinds.翻译:此番言论发表之际，全球第二大经济体的需求依然低迷，中国疫情后的经济复苏近几个月失去动力。美团点评首席执行官王兴此前曾表示，由于宏观经济不利因素，外卖业务第三季度将更加艰难。

Asked about whether the company will consider a share buyback, Wang said the company's board had authorised one of up to $1 billion. However, a buyback would depend on Meituan's cash position due to plans to invest in new initiatives and explore overseas investments, he said.翻译:当被问及公司是否会考虑进行股票回购时，王表示，公司董事会已授权其中一项高达 10 亿美元的回购。不过，他表示，由于美团计划投资新项目和探索海外投资，因此回购将取决于美团的现金状况。

Shares in Meituan, China's largest food delivery provider ahead of Aliaba's Ele.me, have fallen to their lowest level since 2020, having declined 5.2% on Tuesday before its earnings.翻译:美团点评是中国最大的食品配送提供商，领先于阿里旗下的饿了么，其股价已跌至 2020 年以来的最低水平，周二发布财报前下跌 5.2%。

The platform, whose app provides services such as bike sharing, ticket booking and maps, earlier in the day posted a bigger-than-expected 22.1% rise in third-quarter revenue to 76.47 billion yuan ($10.69 billion) versus 62.62 billion yuan in the same period a year earlier.翻译:该平台的应用程序提供自行车共享、票务预订和地图等服务，当天早些时候公布第三季度收入增长 22.1%，达到 764.7 亿元人民币（合 106.9 亿美元），而去年同期为 626.2 亿元人民币。一年前的同一时期。

The result compared with the 75.59 billion average of 15 analyst estimates compiled by LSEG.翻译:该结果与 LSEG 编制的 15 名分析师平均预期 755.9 亿美元进行了比较。

Meituan posted a profit of 3.59 billion yuan versus profit of 1.22 billion yuan a year earlier.翻译:美团点评净利润为35.9亿元，而去年同期为12.2亿元。

Quarterly revenue from core local commerce, which includes food delivery as well as Meituan Instashopping, rose 24.5% to 57.69 billion yuan.翻译:包括外卖和美团Instashopping在内的核心本地商业的季度收入增长24.5%，达到576.9亿元人民币。

Revenue from in-store, hotel booking, and travel sector businesses benefited from a domestic travel rebound over the summer with transaction volume rising 90% year on year.翻译:到店、酒店预订、旅游板块业务收入受益于夏季国内旅游反弹，交易量同比增长90%。

Meituan in May expanded beyond mainland China to Hong Kong with new food delivery business KeeTa, and is reportedly eyeing further international expansion, possibly to Southeast Asia.翻译:美团5月通过新的食品配送业务KeeTa将业务从中国大陆扩展到香港，据报道，美团正在考虑进一步国际扩张，可能会扩展到东南亚。

Reporting by Casey Hall; Additional reporting by Brenda Goh; Editing by Christopher Cushing, Edmund Klamann and Mark Porter翻译:凯西·霍尔报道； Brenda Goh 的补充报道；编辑：克里斯托弗·库欣、埃德蒙·克拉曼和马克·波特

item.title: 独家：中国支付宝将以近4亿美元出售其在印度Zomato的股份
item.description:
Chinese payments group Alipay plans to sell its 3.4% stake in Indian food delivery giant Zomato (ZOMT.NS) for nearly $400 million through block deals on Indian stock exchanges, according to three sources and a Reuters review of the deal's term sheet.翻译:据三位消息人士和路透社对交易条款清单的审查，中国支付集团支付宝计划通过印度证券交易所的大宗交易，以近 4 亿美元的价格出售其持有的印度食品配送巨头 Zomato (ZOMT.NS) 3.4% 的股份。

Alipay, owned by Ant Group, will offload its entire 3.44% stake in the deal, the term sheet seen by Reuters showed.翻译:路透社看到的条款清单显示，蚂蚁集团旗下的支付宝将出售其在此次交易中全部 3.44% 的股份。

Bank of America and Morgan Stanley are advisers on the deal, which is likely to be executed later this week on Indian exchanges, said the three sources, who declined to be named as the plan is private.翻译:这三位消息人士表示，美国银行和摩根士丹利是该交易的顾问，该交易可能于本周晚些时候在印度交易所执行。由于该计划是私人的，因此他们拒绝透露姓名。

Zomato, Bank of America and Morgan Stanley did not immediately respond to a request for comment. Alipay also did not respond outside regular business hours.翻译:Zomato、美国银行和摩根士丹利没有立即回应置评请求。支付宝在正常营业时间之外也没有做出回应。

Zomato shares have surged more than 90% this year, after falling by more than half in 2022 when tech stocks struggled around the world.翻译:Zomato 股价在 2022 年全球科技股陷入困境时下跌了一半以上，但今年已飙升超过 90%。

Alipay "wants to cash out ... the (market) timing is good," said the first source, referring to the rapid rise in Zomato's shares in recent months.翻译:第一位消息人士表示，支付宝“想要套现……（市场）时机很好”，他指的是近几个月来 Zomato 股价的快速上涨。

The block deals are set to be executed at 111.28 rupees per share, a 2.2% discount to Zomato's close on Tuesday, the term sheet said.翻译:条款清单称，大宗交易将以每股 111.28 卢比的价格执行，较 Zomato 周二收盘价折让 2.2%。

In October, Japan's SoftBank (9984.T) sold a 1.1% stake in Zomato, which is India's biggest food delivery service. Demand for online ordering has rapidly grown in recent years, prompting companies like Zomato to aggressively expand.翻译:10月，日本软银（9984.T）出售了印度最大的食品配送服务公司Zomato 1.1%的股份。近年来，在线订购的需求迅速增长，促使 Zomato 等公司积极扩张。

Alipay's exit from Zomato comes as other Chinese investors have been paring their stakes in Indian companies. In August, China's Antfin sold a 10.3% stake in Indian financial giant Paytm (PAYT.NS).翻译:支付宝退出 Zomato 之际，其他中国投资者纷纷减持印度公司的股份。 8月，中国Antfin 出售了印度金融巨头Paytm （PAYT.NS） 10.3%的股份。

Tech stocks such as Zomato have staged a rebound after a drubbing last year amid a market meltdown, when investors also raised questions about sky-high valuations of some Indian startups that had made their stock market debut in recent years.翻译:Zomato 等科技股在经历了去年市场崩盘的惨败后，现已实现反弹，当时投资者还对一些近年来首次上市的印度初创公司的天价估值提出了质疑。

item.title: 中国恒大集团对母公司提起法律诉讼
item.description:
Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) said on Tuesday one of its units had commenced legal proceedings against Hengda Real Estate Group Company and embattled developer China Evergrande (3333.HK), among others.翻译:恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）周二表示，其旗下之一已对恒大地产集团公司和陷入困境的开发商中国恒大（3333.HK）等公司提起法律诉讼。

The unit, Jinbi Property Management Company, has commenced the proceedings for the recovery of about 2 billion yuan ($279.60 million) deposit certificate pledge guarantees.翻译:该单位金碧物业管理公司已启动追回约20亿元人民币（2.796亿美元）存单质押担保的程序。

The proceedings are related to the enforcement of Evergrande Property Services' deposit pledge of about 13.4 billion yuan.翻译:该诉讼涉及恒大物业约134亿元存款质押的执行。

Jinbi Property has also commenced legal proceedings against Shenzhen Qihang Metals Materials Company, Guizhou Guangjuyuan Real Estate Development and Hengda Real Estate Group Guiyang Property.翻译:金碧置业还对深圳市启航金属材料公司、贵州广聚源房地产开发有限公司和恒大地产集团贵阳置业提起法律诉讼。

In February, parent Evergrande had said it was in talks with Evergrande Property Services to repay the funds.翻译:今年2月，母公司恒大集团曾表示，正在与恒大物业洽谈偿还资金事宜。

In July 2022, Evergrande's chief executive and its finance head resigned after a preliminary probe found their involvement in diverting loans secured by Evergrande Property Services.翻译:2022年7月，恒大首席执行官和财务负责人因涉嫌挪用恒大物业担保贷款而辞职。

Evergrande was investigating how deposits worth 13.4 billion yuan belonging to Evergrande Property Services were used as collateral for pledge guarantees and seized by banks.翻译:恒大正在调查恒大物业的134亿元存款如何被用作质押担保的抵押品，并被银行扣押。

Evergrande Property Services has received a notice from the Guangzhou Intermediate People's Court of Guangdong Province formally accepting the filing of the case, it said on Tuesday.翻译:恒大物业周二表示，已收到广东省广州市中级人民法院正式立案的通知。

item.title: 东北煤矿事故11人死亡 - 央视网
item.description:
Eleven people died in an accident at a coal mine in China's northeastern Heilongjiang province on Tuesday, state media outlet CCTV said.翻译:据官方媒体中央电视台报道，周二，中国东北部黑龙江省的一个煤矿发生事故，造成 11 人死亡。

The accident occurred at 3 p.m. (0700 GMT) at the Shuangyang coal mine of Heilongjiang Longmei Shuangyashan Mining Co, and is initially believed to have been caused by a rock burst, the report said.翻译:报道称，事故发生在下午3点（格林威治标准时间0700），发生在黑龙江龙煤双鸭山矿业有限公司双阳煤矿，初步认为是由岩爆引起。

The cause of the accident is under further investigation, CCTV added. Rock bursts happen when pent up energy stored in rock causes it to violently fracture.翻译:央视补充说，事故原因正在进一步调查中。当岩石中储存的被压抑的能量导致岩石剧烈破裂时，就会发生岩爆。

The report did not provide information on whether other people were still unaccounted for.翻译:该报告没有提供其他人是否仍下落不明的信息。

China's coal mines have seen a string of deadly accidents this year despite repeated government calls for stricter enforcement of safety standards, as miners seek to step up coal output.翻译:尽管政府一再呼吁严格执行安全标准，但随着矿工寻求提高煤炭产量，中国煤矿今年仍发生了一系列致命事故。

item.title: 早盘竞价：国债被吞噬，石油为欧佩克提供支持
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Subdued world markets were relieved at the ease with which Monday's sale of U.S. Treasuries was absorbed, but firmer oil prices ahead of the week's postponed OPEC+ meeting cut across any further decline in yields for now.翻译:周一美国国债抛售的轻松消化让低迷的世界市场松了口气，但在本周推迟的欧佩克+会议之前，油价走强，暂时阻止了收益率的进一步下跌。

Benchmark Treasury yields fell back more than 10 basis points to 4.37% after a total of $109 billion of 2 and 5-year notes hit the Street on Monday without much disruption. Another weak U.S. housing readout, with sub-forecast new home sales last month, perhaps flattered the post-auction moves.翻译:周一，总计 1090 亿美元的 2 年期和 5 年期国债在没有受到太大干扰的情况下上市，基准国债收益率回落超过 10 个基点至 4.37%。美国房地产数据的另一项疲弱表现，即上个月的新屋销售低于预期，或许令拍卖后的走势承上启下。

Either way, it helped calm any jitters about another heavy diary of debt sales - with some $39 billion of 7-year notes up for grabs later on Tuesday.翻译:不管怎样，这都有助于平息人们对另一场大规模债务销售的紧张情绪——周二晚些时候将出售约 390 亿美元的 7 年期债券。

November consumer confidence data will also be released as investors assess the mood on the High Street and online from "Black Friday" and "Cyber Monday" retail activity.翻译:11 月消费者信心数据也将发布，投资者将评估“黑色星期五”和“网络星期一”零售活动对商业街和网上的情绪。

Preliminary estimates from Adobe Digital Insights indicated that spending online on Monday was on track to reach a record $12.4 billion as bargain hunters turned out in force. The estimate, which does not account for inflation, predicts an increase of more than 9% from the $11.3 billion that shoppers spent during Cyber Monday last year.翻译:Adobe Digital Insights 的初步估计表明，随着逢低吸纳者的涌入，周一网上支出有望达到创纪录的 124 亿美元。该估算未考虑通货膨胀因素，预计消费者在去年网络星期一期间的支出将比去年的 113 亿美元增长 9% 以上。

That's likely a mixed blessing for Federal Reserve watchers - the continued buoyancy of consumption but with increasing price discrimination.翻译:对于美联储观察人士来说，这可能是喜忧参半——消费持续强劲，但价格歧视日益加剧。

With investors confident the Fed will cut rates through the second half of 2024 at least, top Fed policymakers are on the stump again Tuesday.翻译:由于投资者对美联储至少在 2024 年下半年降息充满信心，美联储高层政策制定者周二再次陷入困境。

Fed futures priced about 85bps of rate cuts through next year, starting in June, though many major banks expect even more.翻译:美联储期货定价了从 6 月份开始到明年大约 85 个基点的降息幅度，不过许多主要银行预计降息幅度会更大。

Oil prices have been a critical factor in the inflation battle of the past two years and although they retreated some 20% from highs of two months ago, traders are now watching closely for signs of further output cuts at OPEC+'s postponed meeting on Thursday - despite murmurs of rifts in the bloc.翻译:油价一直是过去两年通胀斗争中的关键因素，尽管油价较两个月前的高点回落约 20%，但交易员目前正在密切关注周四推迟的 OPEC+ 会议上进一步减产的迹象——尽管存在一些抱怨。集团内的裂痕。

Israeli forces and Hamas fighters appeared to be abiding by a truce for a fifth morning on Tuesday, after a four-day ceasefire was extended at the last minute for at least two days to let more hostages go free.翻译:周二上午，以色列军队和哈马斯武装分子似乎第五次遵守停火协议，此前为期四天的停火协议在最后一刻被延长至少两天，以释放更多人质。

Encouraged by the retreat in debt yields, softening economic data and cooling geopolitical tensions, the dollar index (.DXY) fell back to its lowest since August and is now down 3.8% this month.翻译:受债务收益率回落、经济数据疲软和地缘政治紧张局势降温的鼓舞，美元指数(.DXY)回落至8月以来的最低水平，本月已下跌3.8%。

Stock indexes were pretty directionless, however. A modest loss in the S&P500 (.SPX) on Monday added little new impetus and futures were flat ahead of Tuesday's bell.翻译:然而，股指却相当没有方向。周一标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)的小幅下跌几乎没有带来新的推动力，周二开盘前期货持平。

It was a mixed picture in Asia and Europe too, with Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) underperforming with a loss of almost 1%.翻译:亚洲和欧洲的情况也好坏参半，香港恒生指数(.HSI)表现不佳，下跌近 1%。

There was fresh buzz about new equity sales though. Fashion company Shein has confidentially filed to go public in the United States, according to Reuters sources, in what is likely to be one of the most valuable China-founded companies to list in New York.翻译:不过，关于新股出售的话题又出现了新的热潮。据路透社消息人士透露， 时尚公司 Shein已秘密申请在美国上市，这可能是在纽约上市的最有价值的中国创办公司之一。

Elsewhere, St. Louis Fed researchers estimated the Federal Reserve will need nearly four more years to cover a historic operating loss and start sending profits again to the U.S. Treasury again.翻译:在其他地方，圣路易斯联储研究人员估计， 美联储将需要近四年的时间来弥补历史性的运营损失，并开始再次向美国财政部输送利润。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Tuesday:翻译:周二晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* U.S. Nov consumer confidence, Richmond Fed Nov business survey, Dallas Fed Nov service sector survey, Sept house prices翻译:* 美国11月消费者信心、里士满联储11月商业调查、达拉斯联储11月服务业调查、9月房价

* U.S. Treasury sells 7-year notes, 12-month bills翻译:* 美国财政部出售7年期国债、12个月期国债

* Federal Reserve Board Governor Christopher Waller, Fed Board Governor Michelle Bowman, Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michael Barr, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee all speak; European Central Bank chief Christine Lagarde and ECB chief economist Philip Lane both speak; Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden and BoE policymaker Jonathan Haskel both speak翻译:* 美联储理事克里斯托弗·沃勒、美联储理事米歇尔·鲍曼、美联储监管副主席迈克尔·巴尔、芝加哥联储行长奥斯坦·古尔斯比均发言；欧洲央行行长拉加德和欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普·莱恩均发表讲话；英格兰银行副行长戴夫·拉姆斯登和英国央行政策制定者乔纳森·哈斯克尔均发表讲话

* U.S. corporate earnings: Workday, Hewlett Packard, NetApp, Crowdstrike, Splunk, Alvotech, Pinduoduo, Uxin, Canaan, Elbit, Citi Trends, Fluence Energy, Nano-X Imaging, Safe-T, Leslie's翻译:* 美国企业财报：Workday、惠普、NetApp、Crowdstrike、Splunk、Alvotech、拼多多、优信、嘉楠耘智、埃尔比特、花旗趋势、Fluence Energy、Nano-X Imaging、Safe-T、Leslie's

item.title: 一年过去了，中国的新冠抗议者陷入希望与冷漠之间
item.description:
One year after "white paper" protests flared across China against stringent COVID restrictions, Yicheng Huang fears this rare show of public dissent may eventually be forgotten by the Chinese public amid state censorship.翻译:一年前，中国各地爆发针对严格的新冠限制措施的“白皮书”抗议活动，黄义成担心，这种罕见的公开异议表现可能最终会在国家审查制度下被中国公众遗忘。

The wave of civil disobedience which erupted on Nov 25 last year was unprecedented in President Xi Jinping's decade in power, which has seen a widespread crackdown on civil society.翻译:去年11月25日爆发的公民抗命浪潮在习近平主席执政十年中是前所未有的，公民社会受到了广泛的镇压。

While the protests against the zero-COVID policy were quickly suppressed by police, they helped hasten the end of three years of some of the world's strictest pandemic curbs.翻译:虽然针对零新冠政策的抗议活动很快被警方镇压，但它们帮助加速了世界上一些最严格的流行病遏制措施的三年结束。

"Many protesters experienced being part of a civic collective for the first time," said Huang, who fled to Germany in March after narrowly avoiding detention during protests in Shanghai. "For Chinese people, this is like first love."翻译:“许多抗议者第一次体验到成为公民集体的一部分，”黄说。他在上海的抗议活动中险些被拘留，并于三月份逃往德国。 “对于中国人来说，这就像初恋。”

Six participants based in China and overseas told Reuters they felt a mixture of hope and ambivalence towards the demonstrations, which they said helped to end COVID restrictions but failed to achieve lasting political change.翻译:来自中国和海外的六名参与者告诉路透社，他们对示威活动感到既希望又矛盾，他们说示威有助于结束新冠病毒限制，但未能实现持久的政治变革。

Many spoke on condition of anonymity for fear of state retribution, after last year's widespread police crackdown. Reuters was unable to confirm the total number of protesters detained last year, although some were since released.翻译:在去年警方的广泛镇压之后，由于担心国家报复，许多人都要求匿名。路透社无法确认去年被拘留的抗议者总数，尽管一些人后来被释放。

This year, on the weekend anniversary of the protests, there were no demonstrations in Beijing and Shanghai. There was also a heavy police presence at protest sites. Cities with large Chinese communities overseas, including New York, London and Washington DC, staged commemorative events.翻译:今年，在抗议活动周年纪念日的周末，北京和上海没有发生示威活动。抗议现场也有大量警察驻守。纽约、伦敦、华盛顿等海外华人社区较多的城市都举办了纪念活动。

Huang said many of his Shanghai friends walked past the main protest site to mark the anniversary, but did little else. "It's turned into a forbidden memory, like June 4th," he said, referring to the widely censored 1989 crackdown on student protesters in Tiananmen Square.翻译:黄说，他的许多上海朋友都走过主要抗议地点来纪念周年纪念日，但没有做其他事情。 “它已经变成了一种禁忌的记忆，就像 6 月 4 日一样，”他说，指的是 1989 年天安门广场上受到广泛审查的镇压学生抗议活动。

During last year's Beijing protests, some demonstrators also called for press freedom, democracy and human rights.翻译:在去年的北京抗议活动中，一些示威者还呼吁新闻自由、民主和人权。

Some of the protesters that Reuters spoke to, as well as observers, said the events helped raise awareness of how much political power Chinese people actually wielded.翻译:路透社采访的一些抗议者以及观察人士表示，这些事件有助于提高人们对中国人民实际掌握的政治权力的认识。

An Italy-based Chinese artist and blogger known as "Teacher Li", whose Twitter account became a viral conduit for protest information, told Reuters the protests "brought Chinese people's civic awareness to a new stage, and more people realised they need to stand up to protect their rights."翻译:一位被称为“李老师”的意大利华人艺术家和博主，其推特账户成为抗议信息的病毒传播渠道，他告诉路透社，抗议活动“将中国人民的公民意识提升到了一个新的阶段，更多的人意识到他们需要站起来”以保护他们的权利。”

The protests also preceded small-scale acts of subversion this year, including politically charged costumes during Halloween celebrations in Shanghai and widespread mourning over the death of former Chinese Premier Li Keqiang, who was sidelined by Xi.翻译:这些抗议活动还发生在今年的小规模颠覆活动之前，包括上海万圣节庆祝活动期间穿着带有政治色彩的服装，以及对被习近平排除在外的中国前总理李克强去世的广泛哀悼。

"I never thought that the protests would resonate so widely with people in China, where there's a high degree of monitoring," said a 30-year-old Guangzhou-based demonstrator.翻译:一名 30 岁的广州示威者表示：“我没想到抗议活动会引起如此广泛的共鸣，因为中国的监控程度很高。”

"I finally realised I'm not alone," she said. "This made me feel less pessimistic about China's future political situation, although I'm still pretty pessimistic!"翻译:“我终于意识到我并不孤单，”她说。 “这让我对中国未来的政治形势不那么悲观了，尽管我还是相当悲观！”

Other China-based participants were more ambivalent, saying they would not publicly commemorate the protests or discuss them among friends due to security concerns and a general unwillingness to revisit memories of the pandemic.翻译:其他中国参与者的态度则更为矛盾，他们表示，出于安全考虑以及普遍不愿重温这场大流行病的记忆，他们不会公开纪念这些抗议活动，也不会在朋友之间讨论这些抗议活动。

One of them, a 28-year-old Beijing tech firm employee, said she and a friend were warned by police not to take part in any activities over the weekend, even though they had not been contracted by the authorities before.翻译:其中一名 28 岁的北京科技公司员工表示，她和一名朋友被警方警告不要在周末参加任何活动，尽管她们之前并未与当局签订合同。

These warnings, and the reality of life in China, may dampen hopes for wider social change, she added.翻译:她补充说，这些警告以及中国的现实生活可能会削弱人们对更广泛的社会变革的希望。

"Even if some young first-time protesters did have a political awakening, this was probably soon overtaken by mundane concerns like the bad economy, property market and high unemployment," she said.翻译:她说：“即使一些年轻的首次抗议者确实有了政治觉醒，但这种觉醒可能很快就会被经济不景气、房地产市场和高失业率等世俗担忧所取代。”

item.title: 中国海警警告日本船只不要进入争议海域
item.description:
The Chinese coastguard said its vessels warned off Japanese ships that "illegally intruded" into waters around disputed East China Sea islets on Tuesday.翻译:中国海警表示，其船只周二对“非法侵入”东海争议岛屿周边海域的日本船只发出警告。

The Chinese vessels "took necessary control measures", the coastguard added, without going into details. There was no immediate comment from Japan.翻译:海警补充说，中国船只“采取了必要的控制措施”，但没有透露细节。日本方面没有立即发表评论。

China urged Japan to immediately cease all "illegal activities" in the area and ensure that similar incidents do not recur, the coastguard added.翻译:中国海警补充说，中国敦促日方立即停止在该地区的一切“非法活动”，确保类似事件不再发生。

The waters around Diaoyu Islands, which Japan calls the Senkaku Islands, are disputed and claimed by both China and Japan. The two sides have faced off in the waters, deploying patrol boats and urging the other to leave the area.翻译:钓鱼岛周围海域（日本称之为尖阁诸岛）存在争议，并被中日双方声称拥有主权。双方在海域对峙，派遣巡逻艇并敦促对方离开该地区。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Editing by Andrew Heavens翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；安德鲁·天堂编辑

item.title: 中国官员就东海和南海的海军行动向澳大利亚发出警告
item.description:
China has urged Australia to notify it of navy movements in the contested South China Sea and East China Sea, with a senior Chinese official cautioning that a small incident between militaries could escalate and damage ties.翻译:中国敦促澳大利亚通报其在有争议的南海和东海的海军行动，一名中国高级官员警告说，军队之间的小事件可能会升级并损害两国关系。

Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese last week said a Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner by using its sonar during an incident with an Australian navy vessel in Japan's waters that injured a military diver.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·艾博内斯上周表示，一艘中国军舰在日本水域与一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇发生事故时使用声纳，造成一名军事潜水员受伤，这是一种危险的行为。

The same Australian vessel, Toowoomba, began joint patrols with the Philippines in the South China Sea for the first time on Saturday, amid rising tensions between Beijing and Manila over a disputed shoal.翻译:周六，在北京和马尼拉因争议浅滩问题紧张局势升级之际，同一艘澳大利亚船只“图文巴”号首次与菲律宾在南海进行联合巡逻。

Speaking in Sydney on Tuesday, the head of the international department of the Chinese Communist Party, Liu Jianchao, said the sonar incident took place in waters where there is a dispute between Japan and China, and questioned why the Australian navy was there.翻译:中共中央对外联络部部长刘建超周二在悉尼发表讲话时表示，声纳事件发生在日本和中国有争议的海域，并质疑澳大利亚海军为何出现在那里。

Liu, who denied China had harmed Australian navy personnel, called for "any kind of pre-consultations or notification" to prevent misunderstandings from happening between two militaries.翻译:刘否认中国伤害了澳大利亚海军人员，并呼吁进行“任何形式的预先磋商或通知”，以防止两军之间发生误解。

"Such small incidents could really escalate if it's not properly managed," he said, referring to public emotions. He was speaking in response to questions at an event hosted by the Australia-China Relations Institute at the University of Technology, Sydney.翻译:他在谈到公众情绪时表示：“如果处理不当，这种小事件真的可能会升级。”他是在悉尼科技大学澳中关系研究所主办的一次活动中回答问题时发表上述言论的。

Liu said the presence of Australia's navy vessels appeared to be a statement about China's policies in the South China Sea. "The reason why the Australian naval ships were there was really to contain China - so that is the message that we have been getting", he said.翻译:刘说，澳大利亚海军舰艇的出现似乎是对中国南海政策的一种声明。他说：“澳大利亚海军舰艇在那里的原因实际上是为了遏制中国，这就是我们一直得到的信息。”

He urged the Australian government and military to "act with great prudence in this area".翻译:他敦促澳大利亚政府和军方“在这一领域谨慎行事”。

Australia has previously said it respects the right of all states to exercise freedom of navigation and overflight in accordance with international law. Two-thirds of Australian trade passes through the South China Sea.翻译:澳大利亚此前曾表示，尊重所有国家根据国际法行使航行和飞越自由的权利。澳大利亚三分之二的贸易经过南海。

This month Albanese made the first visit by an Australian leader to China in seven years, after efforts by both sides to stabilize the relationship.翻译:在双方努力稳定两国关系之后，阿尔巴内斯本月进行了澳大利亚领导人七年来首次访华。

Liu said he hoped Australia could revise its screening of Chinese investment on national security factors.翻译:刘表示，希望澳大利亚能够根据国家安全因素修改对中国投资的审查。

Two rare earth investments by Chinese companies have been blocked by the Foreign Investment Review Board this year, and Australia has sought greater investment in the sector by the United States.翻译:今年中国公司的两项稀土投资已被外国投资审查委员会阻止，澳大利亚已寻求美国加大对该行业的投资。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham in Sydney; Editing by Raju Gopalakrishnan翻译:Kirsty Needham 悉尼报道；编辑：拉朱·戈帕拉克里希南

item.title: 汽车业务负责人表示，华为部分汽车业务正走向独立
item.description:
Huawei Technologies (HWT.UL) said some of its automotive partnerships, having gained skills in user experience, product design and marketing, were now ready to move towards independent operations and investment.翻译:华为技术有限公司 (HWT.UL) 表示，其一些汽车合作伙伴在用户体验、产品设计和营销方面获得了技能，现在已准备好转向独立运营和投资。

Huawei's managing director and chairman of its smart car solutions unit Richard Yu made the comments while speaking at a launch event in Shanghai for the Luxeed S7 sedan that Huawei has jointly developed with Chinese automaker Chery(CHERY.UL).翻译:华为董事总经理兼智能汽车解决方案部门董事长余承东在上海举行的华为与中国汽车制造商奇瑞(CHERY.UL)联合开发的Luxeed S7轿车发布会上发表讲话时发表了上述言论。

On Sunday, Huawei announced it would launch a new joint company owned up to 40% with automaker Changan Auto (SASAGG.UL).翻译:周日，华为宣布将与汽车制造商长安汽车 (SASAGG.UL) 成立一家新的合资公司，持股比例为 40%。

The Huawei-backed electric vehicle (EV) brand Aito has received more than 100,000 orders for its revamped M7 model since going on sale two-and-a-half months ago, Yu said, calling it another milestone for the company.翻译:余说，自两个半月前上市以来，华为支持的电动汽车（EV）品牌Aito的改款M7车型已收到超过10万份订单，称这是该公司的另一个里程碑。

Huawei has repeatedly said it does not make cars on its own but only helps other automakers make better vehicles.翻译:华为多次表示，它不自己生产汽车，只是帮助其他汽车制造商生产更好的汽车。

On Tuesday, Yu said Huawei has three models for working with autos manufacturers: providing parts, providing smart solutions or designing and building vehicles.翻译:周二，余承东表示，华为与汽车制造商合作有三种模式：提供零部件、提供智能解决方案或设计和制造汽车。

Reporting by David Kirton; Editing by Jacqueline Wong翻译:大卫·科顿报道；编辑：黄杰奎琳

item.title: 中国习近平敦促在“外部风险”下加强海外法治
item.description:
President Xi Jinping has called for stronger rule of law related to foreign affairs given "external risks and challenges" as China opens up to the outside world, state media reported on Tuesday.翻译:据官方媒体周二报道，鉴于中国对外开放的“外部风险和挑战”，国家主席习近平呼吁加强与外交相关的法治。

Xi, speaking during a study session of the Communist's Party's powerful political bureau, said that to protect its overseas citizens and interests, it was necessary to deepen international cooperation on law enforcement, strengthen consular protection and assistance, and build strong rule of law.翻译:习近平在中共政治局学习时表示，保护海外公民和利益，必须深化国际执法合作，加强领事保护和协助，建设坚强法治。

China's private companies have run into legal challenges abroad in recent years, from U.S. accusations on counterfeit and pirated goods sold on online platforms owned by Tencent Holdings (0700.HK) and Alibaba Group (9988.HK), to steps to ban the TikTok video app, owned by Chinese tech firm ByteDance, in Nepal.翻译:近年来，中国私营企业在海外遭遇法律挑战，从美国指控腾讯控股（0700.HK）和阿里巴巴集团（9988.HK）旗下在线平台销售假冒盗版商品，到禁止 TikTok 视频的措施应用程序，由中国科技公司字节跳动在 尼泊尔拥有。

Xi said in the Monday speech it was necessary to raise compliance awareness and guide the public and enterprises to abide by laws, regulations and customs in the process of "going global".翻译:习近平在周一的讲话中表示，要提高合规意识，引导公众和企业在“走出去”过程中遵守法律法规和习俗。

To facilitate economic and trade exchanges, authorities say Chinese law firms have set up 180 overseas offices in 35 countries and regions, an increase of nearly 50% since 2018.翻译:为便利经贸往来，有关部门表示，中国律师事务所已在35个国家和地区设立了180个海外办事处，自2018年以来增长了近50%。

China needs to actively develop foreign-related legal services and cultivate world-class arbitration institutions and law firms, Xi said.翻译:习近平指出，我国要积极发展涉外法律服务，培育世界一流仲裁机构和律师事务所。

But authorities in some Western countries, including the U.S., Canada, Britain and the Netherlands, have accused China of illegally setting up "overseas police service centres" to monitor its overseas citizens, accusations that Beijing vehemently denies.翻译:但包括美国、加拿大、英国和荷兰在内的一些西方国家当局指责中国非法设立“海外警察服务中心”来监视其海外公民，北京方面强烈否认这一指控。

China says such centres are meant to help its citizens renew expired driving licences, and are run by Chinese volunteers, not law enforcement officers.翻译:中国表示，这些中心旨在帮助其公民更新过期的驾驶执照，并且由中国志愿者而非执法人员运营。

The call to better protect citizens abroad coincides with recent outbreaks of conflict in countries such as Ukraine and Sudan that have led to China organising evacuations of its people.翻译:在呼吁更好地保护海外公民的同时，乌克兰和苏丹等国最近爆发了冲突，导致中国组织了人员撤离。

China has organised almost 20 evacuations and dealt with more than 500,000 cases of consular protection involving millions of its people over the past decade, according to the foreign ministry.翻译:据外交部称，过去十年来，中国组织了近20次撤侨行动，处理了超过50万起领事保护案件，涉及数百万人。

Reporting by Ryan Woo; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:瑞恩·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
